FuncDef: This command specifies the Python script for the specified DHCPv4 packet type in the specified direction.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the message type of the event. Values-discover, offer, request, decline, ack, nak, release, inform, force-renew, lease-query, lease-unassigned, lease-unknown, lease-active.
Specifies whether the packet is being received by the system or being sent by the system.
Specifies the name of the Python script up to 32 characters, that will be used to handle the specified message.
